entry.title: Goodbye Apple Magic Mouse
entry.summary: I absolutely love the multi-touch surface of the Apple Magic Mouse 2. It's easy, it's intuitive, and it's natural. Unfortunately, the mouse is wildly non-ergonomic. Almost just as importantly, the battery seems to die, without fail, an hour into my work-day. In order to get any work done, I need a backup $79 Apple Magic Mouse 2.
